question.text: The impressive floral display at the building entrance is ___ made up of blue flowers, with a few red ones artfully placed throughout.
Everybody employed by this office___a professional degree.

answer.explanation: (A) The singular verb form “has” agrees with the singular subject “everybody”. Choice (B) is a plural verb. Choice (C) is an infinitive so cannot be used as the main verb. Choice (D) is present continuous, a form usually not used with a stative verb such as “have”.

question.text: Dr. Chan’s groundbreaking research on hospital services has effectively redefined the basic ___ of patient care.

answer.explanation:
The answer goes with "the", "of", and an adjective so we use a noun.
Concept of st = Meaning of st

question.text: The MNS Railroad's most ___ passenger route runs through the White Mountain region and the Still River valley.

answer.explanation:
The word "most" implies that this is a superlative adjective or adverb so we choose "picturesque".
Picturesque = Scenic = Beautiful

question.text: You will find the manual very helpful ___ any problems you encounter when you first use the software.
It is important to dress___when going on a job interview.

answer.explanation: (D) This is an adverb of manner modifying the verb dress. Choice (A) is a verb. Choice (B) is a noun. Choice (C) is an adjective.

question.text: The environmental protection plans submitted to the council were developed by various organizations working ___ of each other.

answer.explanation: Independent of sb/st >< dependent on sb/st

question.text: You can expect___your first paycheck before the end of your first month of employment.

answer.explanation: (B) The verb “expect” is followed by an infinitive verb. Choice (A) is base form or present tense. Choice (C) is a gerund or present participle. Choice (D) is a noun.

question.text: The new restaurant on Park Avenue has ___ much excitement because of the international reputation of its executive chef.
It is always advisable to verify departure times, ___ flight schedules may change after a ticket is issued.
